name: Deep Space Solitude
description:
"Deep Space Solitude" is a first-person horror game. You play as a journalist with an insatiable thirst for the truth, who stumbles upon the news of a missing scientist. You set out to the outskirts in your car, alone, to uncover the concealed truths lurking in the darkness. Faced with puzzles and challenges, you must search for and use your tools and weapons, overcome your fears, and escape with your life.

An Eerie Journey Step by Step
Throughout the game, players will encounter various types of boss battles, requiring courage and intelligence to overcome them.



Combining Fun and Challenges
Stranded in an abandoned cabin, players will come across different types of minigames to alleviate tension and can use the resources obtained from these minigames to tackle subsequent challenges.



Uncover Hidden Truths
In this non-linear game, players must collect various notes and videotapes that will gradually unveil the story hidden in the darkness...


■ A Miniature Sandbox Experience with Multiple Endings and Branches.
■ Interact with the Game World through Tactile and Physical Mechanics.
■ Scavenge Resources to Aid in Your Survival.
■ Multiple Problem-Solving Approaches in a Non-Linear Storyline.
